Body: Consider languages whose case-systems allow the order of arguments to be changed without changing the arguments’ grammatical relations. (Note the 189 languages noted as having “no dominant word-order” at http://wals.info/feature/81A .) In such languages, what information is word order typically used to convey?
Title: What is word order used for in "free word order" languages?

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I'm a conlanger who needs reliable information about real languages. By profession, I'm a speech/language therapist, so some of my questions may be work-related as well.
